ai-patthana16.80:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.80:0.3_0: Seeing each one’s own tusks, feeding on him shoulder,
ai-patthana16.80:1.1_0: Not seeing the cause, without resentment, because of not-self, not seeing its cause, with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.80:2.1_0: Not seeing the cause, without reserveing, one should be given up by seeing, by seeing no cause or condition.
ai-patthana16.80:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
